Description:
Relaxed Seaside Escape
Perfectly positioned just metres to the Cowes shopping precinct and only a short stroll to the fabulous north facing bay beach, is this beautifully maintained, light filled and substantial two bedroom double storey townhouse. The lower level comprises a powder room and a great size open plan living, kitchen and dining area which flows through to a wonderful north facing alfresco area perfect for entertaining with family and friends or just relaxing in tranquil, private settings.
Timber stairs lead up to a spacious second level boasting a second living area, with access onto an additional north facing private balcony with a lovely treed outlook, two good size bedrooms with built in robes and a large dual access ensuite/family bathroom, including corner spa.
There is also a second open parking space beside the garage, ideal for parking your boat.
Additional features include: dishwasher, electric upright stove and range-hood, two split system heating/cooling units, heated towel rail
The garage allows direct internal access while having the convenience of a laundry with clothes line and access to the back courtyard.
This low maintenance lifestyle is perfect for either holiday/permanent living or as an investment property.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island
Insights: 1/26 Douglas Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
SOLD
Located in a quiet court opposite a beautiful park, this contemporary home has it all and is ready for you to move in and enjoy. If you've been contemplating a build, don't bother, when everything is done for you here. The home features 3 bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, a second main bathroom, a study, a spacious open plan living area with kitchen and dining area plus a fully enclosed alfresco area with high quality sliding clear blinds. An established low maintenance garden and double garage with secure access into the home completes the picture. A long settlement to May and Vendors who would be willing to rent back provides some extra options for your purchase.

Description:
BEAUTIFUL CUSTOM BUILT HOME IN EXCELLENT LOCATION
This impeccable home custom built with the owner's design by Ewington Homes in 2004 is located in the fantastic northern shores estate of Cowes in a quiet court position, close to parkland, playgrounds and shopping centre and only minutes’ walk to Cowes North facing bay beaches.
This three bedroom, plus study or fourth bedroom property oozes charm and boasts spacious living. Entering the home you are greeted by a large entrance hall with two guest bedrooms and full bathroom on the left, with the study or fourth bedroom on the right.
The spacious chef’s kitchen features large oven with gas cooktop and range hood, stainless steel dishwasher, Caesar stone benchtops and plenty of storage and a large pantry.
The open plan living/dining is an entertainer’s mecca, not to mention the outdoor room with blinds and a fantastic BBQ entertaining space. There is a powder room for the use of all guests.
There is also a second living area with gas log fire, beautiful timber mantel and finished bi-part doors.
Featuring a grand master bedroom boasting an en-suite, his and hers vanities, shower and spa bath as well as a large walk in robe.
Other features include a large three car garage at the front of the property, full-sized laundry with ample storage, separate store room, evaporative cooling throughout, panel heaters throughout, ducted vacuuming, split system in the living/dining area, double glazed windows at the rear of the property, 3Kw solar system, instant gas hot water, outdoor shower, and low maintenance landscaped gardens.
Property features off street parking for a boat or caravan or additional five-six cars.
Situated on a spacious 697sqm North facing block with the under-roof area being 35.37sqm. Additionally, there are nine inch ceilings and outside blinds on all the west facing windows.
This property would make a perfect family home, holiday getaway or the ultimate holiday rental.
Call today to arrange your private inspection.
Insights: 2 Amanda Close, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Position Is The Key!
This delightful property situated within walking distance to the main shopping centre, RSL, school, medical facilities, and in close proximity to the fabulous bay beach, offers a care free coastal lifestyle. Comprising spacious light filled open plan living and dining area enhanced with polished timber floors, split system heating/cooling and separate renovated kitchen, three bedrooms, master with double built in robes and shelving, and spacious family bathroom combined laundry.
Additional features include : Electric cooking, sliding door access to the back deck and yard allowing plenty of room for children and pets to play, carport
Set on a fully fenced, 580sqm approx allotment complete with a storage shed/games room at the rear of the property.
This fabulous home located in a most sought after position is ideal for both permanent/holiday living or would make a great investment property.
Currently has a great tenant in place - Inspection by appointment only - we require 24 hours notice
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY PRESENTED
This beautifully presented brick home is nestled in a quiet court, close to Cowes north facing beaches and only a stone’s throw from Cowes shopping precinct.
The spacious master bedroom has an en-suite and there are two additional bedrooms plus a second main bathroom.
Enjoy the light filled and warm living space with high timber lined ceilings, open fire place and split system heating & cooling. A separate dining area and bright, functional kitchen complete the layout of this single level home.
The property is complete with lock up garage, established gardens and paved outdoor area at the rear so there is nothing for you to do but move in and enjoy!
Ideal as a family home, investment or holiday getaway properties in this area are well sought after and will not last long.

Description:
CENTRAL COWES
Supremely positioned, this beautifully presented four year old home is a short walk to Cowes beach, restaurant/shopping precinct and primary school.
Immaculate throughout, the home offers four bedrooms, central bathroom and en-suite to master. A well appointed kitchen with walk in pantry is complemented by a spacious family lounge area with stacker doors opening to the large undercover alfresco area. The home has zoned, and fully ducted heating/cooling, double glazed windows and is fully insulated including under floor insulation.
Vinyl planks and tiles throughout for easy cleaning after walking home from the beach !
In addition, the property is fully secured with an electric remote controlled sliding gate and electric remote controlled window shutters.
PLUS a huge 9.5m x 8.5m x 4.8m high shed with 3.5m high remote roller door, for easy access and storage of your boat/caravan or both ! Shed also has hot and cold water plus sewerage connected.
Be quick, homes in this location sell fast!

Description:
PENTHOUSE POSITION PERFECTION
This luxury Penthouse, with it's striking panoramic northern views of Westernport Bay, the Mornington Peninsula and French Island, is one of the finest 3 bedroom apartments in Cowes. It is perfectly situated high over and only 50 metres from the beach and within minutes of restaurants, shops and supermarkets.
The layout is open plan incorporating one entire floor of the complex and instantly impresses on entering with stunning views, light and spaciousness. The interior blends seamlessly with terraces all round and with the vast spatial stage that is the Cowes foreshore; the pier, the ferries, visiting ships, colourful yachts, the golden beaches, the dark silhouette of the pines and elms and the sidewalk cafes.
What distinguishes this property from others is the wide frontage and width of view from all parts of the living areas. Every room has a view and the panorama from the living areas is without comparison. High up over Westernport Bay the sun, the sea and the sky create an ever-changing theatrical stage, both by day and night, all year round. Large terraces allow for outdoor living like no other yet are still private and protected. All this and parking for 3 vehicles on title.
The spacious, tiled terraces with etched frameless glass balustrades are carefully arranged and located for morning and afternoon outdoor living and sun bathing. Floor to ceiling glass and generous sliding glass doors integrate the indoors with the terraces and bring the seaside ambiance right into every part of the apartment. The central Alpine Carousel “spinafire” with its swirling flames creates a cosy winter ambience while you are surrounded by that view.
Wide eaves provide covered outdoor protection and shield the glass from the summer sun while allowing warming sun in cooler months. Generous parking and a secure storeroom makes this property so unique and so versatile as a weekender or for permanent living. This is a low maintenance apartment designed for luxury living at its best.
Designed for and by the owner without compromise. The innovative design, quality low maintenance detailing, and first class construction were recognised by winning the Master Builders Association awards in 2007.
Insights: 6/2-4 Warley Avenue, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 12 other 3 bedroom unit in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Expect the Unexpected
This conveniently located property is in one of the most sought-after areas of Cowes and with only a 500m walk to the family friendly, pristine north facing Cowes beach.
Recently renovated to a high standard, this stunning home provides bright, open living spaces and a well thought-out floor plan for easy living. Featuring three bedrooms, all with built in robes, ducting heating and a spacious central family bathroom with separate toilet. The master bedroom is complete with full ensuite and sliding doors out to a decked area. Stylish well designed kitchen, with stone bench tops, mirrored splashback, stainless steel appliances including induction cooktop and a walk in pantry. The living area has split system heating/cooling, combustion heating, along with ceiling fans and a concealed built-in Study area and storage for all the family needs.
Outside of the home you will find an extensive covered North-facing decked outdoor area complimented by low maintenance gardens, a Single lock up garage and single carport plus off street parking for several vehicles and plenty of storage areas throughout.
Suitable as a permanent residence or holiday retreat, you will be impressed with the quality of this home. Properties like this one do not last long so contact us to arrange an inspection today

Description:
SUPER CENTRAL LOCATION CLOSE TO BEACH
This fantastic 2 storey townhouse is located only 230 metres (approx.) from Cowes North facing, bay beach and 400 metres (approx.) to Cowes main street and shops and restaurants and wouls make an ideal holiday home.
Downstairs features an open plan living dining area, kitchen with dishwasher, electric oven and cooktop, understair powder room, laundry, patio area and single garage (additional parking adjacent to complex).
Upstairs comprises of a spacious master bedroom with en-suite and BIR’s, a further 2 bedrooms both with BIR’s, bathroom with shower and bath and a study area at the top of the stairs with access to a North facing balcony.
Air conditioning is provided by a reverse cycle split system in the downstairs living area. Currently tenanted, this property would make an ideal investment property or holiday home. Call today to arrange an inspection.

No need to book a holiday for Summer when you still have time to purchase your own beach house.

Description:
Your Very Own Private Oasis!
Set amongst lovely lush landscaped and private gardens is this beautifully presented and maintained family home which blends harmoniously with its tranquil surrounds.
Comprising a spacious light filled open plan living, dining and updated kitchen area featuring high ceilings and exposed beams, this delightful home boasts a warm, relaxed and comfortable feel throughout. The living area, with it's large expanse of windows, overlooks the northeast facing front deck and secluded front garden. Accommodation includes three bedrooms, two of which have polished timber floors while the main bedroom has built in robes and opens onto the rear deck. To complete this character filled home is a family bathroom including bath and double basin vanity as well as a second bathroom with shower and vanity, a separate second toilet and laundry.
The rear of the home has an expansive undercover entertaining area, perfect to sit back and relax whilst overlooking the stunning garden. Stairs lead to the rear garden where you will find a fabulous 10metre by 6 metre garage/studio complete with wood heater for added ambience and featuring gorgeous french doors that open out to the beautiful and private garden.
Additional features include : split system heating/cooling, dishwasher, gas cooking and hot water, solar panels, under house storage access, 10metre x 6metre x 2.7metre high garage plus a 3metre x 3metre garden/storage shed, fully fenced and low maintenance yards, including a dog run.
All set on a 603sqm approx allotment in close proximity to Red Rocks bay beach and only a short drive into the Cowes shopping precinct makes this home ideal for permanent/holiday living or as an investment property - Welcome to carefree coastal living!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Hurry Don't Miss Out!!
This elegant three bedroom family home features impressive extras and style. Filled with natural light and with a free flowing floor plan it has a great sense of space. Comprising of three generous bedrooms, the master with ensuite and walk in robe and large family bathroom is central to the other two bedrooms and living areas.
This superbly designed dwelling, presents a spacious living and meals area overlooked by a well-appointed kitchen including stone bench tops and 900mm free standing oven. Keep the home warm over winter with the Gas log fire place, and cool in summer with the split system cooling. Extra features include LED downlights, Solar panels, and side access for caravan or boat, alfresco area with zip-track blinds making it a all year round entertaining space.
Located in the highly sought after prestigious Whytesands Estate and set on a 476sqm block and less then 1.5km (approx) to the stunning, north facing Cowes beach and only 2.4km (approx) to the Cowes shopping precinct. This estate provides for all types of buyers, NBN, parks and gardens for the kids to play in with Soccer net, AFL goals, ¼ Basketball court BBQ and Zip line.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Cosy, Comfortable, Central Cowes
Here is a fantastic opportunity to buy in a great position in Central Cowes. This neat and tidy family home comprising of an open plan living/dining kitchen area, three bedrooms, and a family bathroom.
Set on a 612sqm approx fully fenced allotment with established low maintenance surrounds with double garage sitting at the rear of the block.
With less than 1km to Cowes shopping strip and town centre and Cowes bay beach, the property would be ideal as a first home, permanent home or for investment purposes.

Description:
WHEN YOU WANT THE VERY BEST
This modern light filled, big open feeling home is situated in the new Shearwater Estate on Phillip Island. A private builder has constructed this home with quality in every aspect of this home. As you walk in the formal entry you are greeted with a HUGE open living plan, large master bedroom with ensuite facilities situated in its own wing… Formal northerly lounge room, separate living/dining and hostess kitchen complete with stone benches. Large double sliding doors invite you out to the private undercover northerly courtyard.
The next part of your new home offers a second living zone, 3 further large bedrooms, and central bathroom. Enjoy the benefits of solar power. Situated just around the corner from the Phillip Island golf course and just a short distance to Silverleaves Beach, You get that feeling of truly getting away the hustle and bustle, enjoy great walks, water sports, fishing and canoeing!! Or you just sit back and relax.
Inspection highly recommended…Currently tenanted with great tenants.
Special Features: - MODERN LIGHT BRIGHT HOME, DOUBLE GARAGE – NORTHERLY ASPECT – HUGE MASTER BEDROOM

Description:
BEACH LIVING AT IT'S BEST!
This property has been created for low maintenance coastal living. Featuring a spacious & stylish open plan, living and dining space that expands onto a large outdoor balcony to take in the beautiful bay views.
There are three well sized bedrooms and two bathrooms, one with which has a spa bath.
What an opportunity awaits for an astute purchaser ! Excellent views, presentation, security and access to all amenities and the foreshore beach within seconds.
Set over a single level it could be a great investment, owner occupied or holiday home.
Park the car and put your walking shoes on to enjoy all that Cowes has to offer!

Description:
Touch Of Class
Built to perfection, this contemporary home has everything you need and more! Ideally located in a highly desirable Shearwater Estate, this beautifully presented property will delight the most fastidious buyers. Thoughtfully designed but created to impress, this fabulous near new home boasts quality inclusions blended with the effortless style and luxury of modern living.
3 bedrooms plus study and 2 separate living areas, the clever layout, both inside and out, ensures that there is a space for all the family. The main open plan living area is one of the many highlights of the home. The free flowing kitchen, dining and family area is perfect for large gatherings and the impeccably appointed kitchen. An additional separate lounge at the front of the home is perfect to enjoy the north sun through the windows all year round.
The fully landscaped backyard has been designed with low maintenance, easy living and enjoying life at the beach in mind.
Just minutes from schools and shops, Cowes Golf Club and Silverleaves beachfront, this sophisticated property is the answer for those seeking spacious contemporary modern living. So don't miss out on making this your new home. This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
